statements: DELETE FROM fitness_plans WHERE patient_id = 100 AND activity_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM fitness_plans WHERE activity_level = 'Low' AND patient_id = 200;
DELETE FROM ActivityRecord WHERE date = '2022-05-10' AND steps_count > 10000;
DELETE FROM fitness_plan WHERE patient_id = 3 AND calories_goal < 2000;
DELETE FROM wearable_device WHERE device_name = 'Fitbit' AND steps_count > 10000;
DELETE FROM fitness_plan WHERE patient_id = 1 AND duration_days < 30;
DELETE FROM wearable_devices WHERE device_type = 'smartwatch' AND patient_id NOT IN (SELECT patient_id FROM fitness_plans);
